snippets.snippet: Very clean and nice view
Clean rooms, very friendly staff, excellent breakfast (especially Treehouse-wonderful service).
The location within walking distance to downtown Chaweng and the staff's response was excellent.
Nice beach front, not too far walk to Central Samui and all the restaurants & bars.
We had a great time , the rooms are large a s comfortable When booking keep in mind they have beach facing rooms with plunge pools , these are their best rooms
Love how huge the room was and staffs were amazingly friendly and helpful.
Breakfast was great too!
Beautiful design, clean beachfront, amazing rooms with private pool.
The place is very clean and pleased Stuff are very nice and helpful
Location was great, staff were fabulous.
Excellent service, spacious rooms, comfortable facilities.
Room is spacious.
This place is absolutely stunning, the rooms are beautiful and clean.
The room was very big, clean, comfortable and few steps fron the beach and the main pool.
Excellent property, superb location , courteous staff….
the thing that makes this hotel as well as the amazing location on the beach are the staff.
Room is very spacious.
The room was big & nice.
The beach was awesome and restaurant with breakfast was serving great.
Our room was beautiful and spotless.

certificate.name: SHA Plus Certified
certificate.description: More than 70% of SHA-certified establishment employees have been vaccinated.

description.short: In addition to the standard of SHA Plus, all guests get free Wi-Fi in all rooms and free parking if arriving by car. Conveniently situated in the Chaweng part of Koh Samui, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Be sure to set some time aside to visit Fisherman's Village as well as Chaweng Beach nearby. Rated with 5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and fitness center on-site.

description.short: In addition to the standard of SHA Plus, all guests get free Wi-Fi in all rooms and free parking if arriving by car. Conveniently situated in the Taling Ngam part of Koh Samui, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous Fisherman's Village.  Rated with 5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and hot tub on-site.
